script1.segment1: Timmy was excited to learn riding a bicycle his dad
script1.segment2: had bought for him yesterday morning with bright colors
script1.segment3: He had seen kids ride by with such ease
script1.segment4: and now wanted to ride like them very fast
script1.segment5: His dad took him to the park nearby home
script1.segment6: where there were no cars or any big trucks
script1.segment7: His dad held the bike steady for Timmy sit
script1.segment8: and told him to get on and feel confident

script2.segment1: Timmy sat on the bike with shaky legs down
script2.segment2: his dad held the saddle and ran alongside fast
script2.segment3: Tell me to pedal and I will make you
script2.segment4: go very smoothly on this bike with fun
script2.segment5: Timmy pedaled and the bike started moving slow
script2.segment6: his dad ran and said you are doing great job
script2.segment7: keep pedaling and don't look back now keep
script2.segment8: going and I will catch you if you fall down

script3.segment1: As Timmy pedaled his dad let go bike slowly
script3.segment2: and Timmy rode on his own for few seconds
script3.segment3: but then he lost balance and fell off loudly
script3.segment4: his dad rushed and helped him stand up quickly
script3.segment5: Are you okay Timmy don't cry my son
script3.segment6: that was just a small mistake you will learn
script3.segment7: keep trying and you will ride like pro soon
script3.segment8: don't worry I am here to help you always

script4.segment1: With some more practice Timmy was riding smoothly
script4.segment2: his dad cheered and clapped with great joy
script4.segment3: you did it Timmy you are a pro now
script4.segment4: ride to me and I will give you a treat
script4.segment5: Timmy rode to his dad with smiling face
script4.segment6: and his dad gave him a big chocolate cake
script4.segment7: Timmy was happy and hugged his dad very
script4.segment8: tightly for teaching him to ride the bike
